assetRequirements.purpose: main visual to capture attention and convey the essence of autumn in Paris
assetRequirements.visual_style: vibrant autumn colors with a focus on Parisian landmarks
assetRequirements.content_context: depicting the beauty of Paris in autumn with cozy street cafes and colorful foliage

assetRequirements.purpose: visual representation of Paris during autumn
assetRequirements.visual_style: soft focus on romantic spots in Paris

usageInstructions.placement: Place according to campaign layout requirements
usageInstructions.context: Use in context of: Париж осенью: ваше незабываемое путешествие!. Ensure asset aligns with brand guidelines and campaign messaging.
usageInstructions.responsiveBehavior: Scale proportionally for mobile devices. Ensure minimum readable size on small screens.
usageInstructions.accessibilityRequirements: Ensure alt text is provided: "AI-selected These icons will enhance the call-to-action buttons, making them visually appealing and encouraging user engagement.". Alt text should be descriptive and convey the image's purpose in the email context.
usageInstructions.fallbackStrategy: If image fails to load, display alt text with appropriate background color
